attributes.action: Urgently bring in a bill to give ellectors the right to recall for special ellections MPs; who at least 10% of their electorate believe to no longer represent them or who have acted dishonourably.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is time to empower the electorate and make a start at reinstitute trust in our elected representaives.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
